===Etymology 1===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|み}}
From {{etyl|ojp|ja|sort=み}}. Cognate with {{m|ja|実|tr=mi||seed, fruit, offspring}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref>

Standalone form of ''mu'' below. May derive as ''mu'' + {{m|ja|い|tr=i|pos=emphatic nominative particle}}. See also the etymology of {{m|ja|神|tr=kami, kamu}}.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|み|acc=0|acc_ref=DJR}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|み}}

# a [[body]]
#: By extension:
## the [[main]] part of something
## the [[blade]] of a [[sword]]
## [[oneself]]
## one's [[position]], one's [[social]] [[standing]] or [[circumstances]]
## [[meat]], [[flesh]]
## [[wood]] {{qualifier|emphasis on the inside, as opposed to the bark}}

====Derived terms====
{{der-top}}
* {{ja-r|身分|みぶん}}: one's [[identity]], one's [[social]] [[standing]]
* {{ja-r|中身|なかみ}}: [[contents]], the [[insides]] of something
{{der-bottom}}

===Etymology 2===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|む}}
From {{etyl|ojp|ja|sort=む}}. Bound form of ''mi'' above, only found in compounds.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|む}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|む}}

# a [[body]]

=====Derived terms=====
{{der-top}}
* {{ja-r|身代|むかわり}}, {{ja-r|質|むかわり}}: a [[hostage]]
* {{ja-r|躯|むくろ}}, {{ja-r|骸|むくろ}}, {{ja-r|身|むくろ}}: a (living) [[body]]; a (dead) body, a [[corpse]]; a [[rotten]] [[tree trunk]]
* {{ja-r|正身|むざね}}, {{ja-r|実|むざね}}: the true [[nature]] of a [[person]] or [[thing]]
{{der-bottom}}

===Etymology 3===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|むくろ}}
From {{etyl|ojp|ja|sort=むくろ}}. Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=むくろ|身|tr1=mu|t1=body|pos1=bound form of standalone ''mi''|くろ|tr2=kuro}}. The derivation of the ''kuro'' element is uncertain, but it might be an alteration or ancient form of {{m|ja|幹|tr=kara||trunk, main part}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref>

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|むくろ|acc=0|acc_ref=DJR}}

====Alternative forms====
* {{ja-l|躯}}, {{ja-l|骸}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|むくろ}}

# a [[living]] [[body]]
#* '''720''', {{m|ja|日本書紀}} ([[w:Nihon Shoki|''Nihon Shoki'']], “Chronicles of Japan”), Volume 7, in the section on {{lang|ja|景行天皇}} (''Keikō-tennō'', [[w:Emperor Keikō|Emperor Keikō]]):
#*: {{lang|ja|身'''體'''長大}}
#*: {{ja-usex|人となり、'''むくろ'''長く大きにして|ひととなり、 '''むくろ''' たかく おおき に して|His personality and '''body''' were lofty and great}}
# a [[dead]] [[body]], a [[corpse]]
#* '''14th century''', {{lang|ja|太平記}} ([[w:Taiheiki|''Taiheiki'']]):
#*: {{ja-usex|御首は敷皮の上に落ちて'''質'''は尚坐せるが如し|おんくび は しきかは の うえ に おちて '''むくろ''' は なほざせる が ごとし|The head fell onto the hide rug, and the '''corpse''' looked as if it were sitting straight...}}
# a [[rotten]] [[tree trunk]]

====Derived terms====

{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=o|しん}}
